content.raw: I am thinking whether or not if we should make this configurable to allow an secondary runner associated to a performer, e.g. when a client subscribes to laser data associated with `R1` which initially would be generated by `SR1` but as `R1` moves to a different level, e.g. `L2`, the laser data are now generated by `SR2`. I’m not sure how easy it would be to handle this transition on the pub/sub transport level - here I’m assuming that secondary runners could be on different machines, maybe that’s not the case?
